CustomField.formula: IF( Contract_Start_Date__c > TODAY(), "Contract Not Started", IF( Contract_End_Date__c < Contract_Start_Date__c, "Contract End Date Passed", IF( FLOOR((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c) / 365) > 0, TEXT(FLOOR((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c) / 365)) & IF( FLOOR((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c) / 365) = 1, " Year", " Years" ), "" ) & IF( FLOOR(MOD((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c), 365) / 30) > 0, IF( FLOOR((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c) / 365) > 0, " ", "" ) & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c), 365) / 30)) & IF( FLOOR(MOD((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c), 365) / 30) = 1, " Month", " Months" ), "" ) & IF( MOD((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c), 30) > 0, IF( FLOOR((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c) / 365) > 0 || FLOOR(MOD((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c), 365) / 30) > 0, " ", "" ) & TEXT(MOD((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c), 30)) & IF( MOD((Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c), 30) = 1, " Day", " Days" ), "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Duration Remaining
